title: Divya Kanthi Haaram: Diamond and Gemstone Long Necklace
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Kundan setting. Features brilliant-cut Diamonds of VS clarity. Adorned with genuine Emeralds
and a subtle Rose Quartz centerpiece. Finished with a lasting Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram boasts a traditional South Indian design with a contemporary twist. The intricate lacework design incorporates floral motifs embellished with Diamonds. The cascading pendant features a central Emerald stone and delicate gold detailing. The piece showcases a 'Kasula peru' inspired border with hanging gold 'gundlu' (beads) for added grace.
colors: The necklace features a harmonious blend of sparkling white Diamonds
the soft pink of Rose Quartz
and the warm glow of 22K Gold.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as Muhurtham
and formal gatherings. A statement piece for special celebrations.
description: This majestic Haaram embodies timeless elegance and cultural heritage. The use of high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. It is a symbol of prosperity and auspiciousness, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The blend of traditional design with modern sensibilities makes it a versatile piece for both traditional and contemporary attire.
